titles.title: Urban Development Action Grant Program Termination Act
A bill to terminate the urban development action grant program.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 10/6/1988--Introduced. Urban Development Action Grant Program Termination Act - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to terminate the urban development action grant program. States that such Act shall not affect already approved grants or obligated funds.
